sentences.english: Night terrors are an inherited problem and occur in about 2% of children.
sentences.chinese: 夜惊是遗传性的，约2%的孩子会有夜惊问题。

sentences.english: And the "Scream" mask has become a classic Halloween costume.
sentences.chinese: “惊声尖叫”面具也成为经典万圣节装饰。

sentences.english: The horse took fright and ran away with the carriage.
sentences.chinese: 马受了惊，拖着马车狂奔起来。

sentences.english: People are surprised mouth-opened at hearing the shocking news.
sentences.chinese: 听到这条令人震惊的消息时，人们都惊得张大了嘴巴。

sentences.english: People listened to the shocking news with open-mouthed astonishment.
sentences.chinese: 听到这条令人震惊的消息时，人们都惊得张大了嘴巴。

sentences.english: I helped the trembling child off the horse and into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我把战战惊惊的孩子扶下马，陪他进了房子。

sentences.english: I helped the trembling child off the horse and into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我把战战惊惊的孩子扶下马，陪他进了房子。

sentences.english: I gasped with surprise at the unexpected news.
sentences.chinese: 听到这意外的消息我惊得倒吸了一口冷气。

sentences.english: He stared pop-eyed as the huge wave came straight towards the boat.
sentences.chinese: 巨浪直逼小船而来，他惊得眼睛都瞪出来了。

sentences.english: Robert was shocked almost to dumbness.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特被惊得哑口无言。

sentences.english: I was surprised and embarrassed. I sat down. I helped her with the socks.
sentences.chinese: 我又惊又窘地坐了下来，帮她穿袜子。

sentences.english: I helped the trembling child off the horse and into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我把战战惊惊的孩子扶下马，陪他进了房子。

sentences.english: I helped the trembling child off the horse and into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我把战战惊惊的孩子扶下马，陪他进了房子。

sentences.english: An untrained horse had taken fright at the sound of gunfire .
sentences.chinese: 一匹未经训练的马听到枪响受了惊。

sentences.english: Living with a mother who lied to me for 15 years scares me.
sentences.chinese: 同一个额左我15年嘅妈咪住令我好惊。

sentences.english: Perhaps you were surprised by how little effect personality had on whether the seminarians stopped?
sentences.chinese: 也许你对于个性很少影响助人行为这一点很惊呀。
